metadata.title: Tru-Spec Men's H2o Proof 3-in-1 Jacket
features: LIGHTWEIGHT JACKET: The 2-layers stylish jackets for men with 100 percent Tactical Nylon are engineered as an on-duty or off-duty wear keeping men's shape in mind;
COMFORT FIT: Comfortable parka jacket includes an inner Cumulus Jacket/Liner that is a fully functional liner but can be worn separately as a stand alone insulated

EFFICIENT DESIGN: Wind and waterproof breathable outerwear with bemis taped seams making it environmentally safe; Cape opening on back with zipper closure and side zippers on both the jacket and liner for ventilation and access to duty belt

ZIP UP JACKET WITH MULTIPLE POCKETS: Zipper front closure and detachable hood with wraparound chin guard, flexible wire brim, and hood volume adjustment, Back pocket at waist height, (2) Large chest level stowage pockets and two lower hand pocket with zipper closures
HIGH-PERFORMANCE JACKETS FOR MEN: Comfy jacket specifically made to combat the harsh weather, this men's apparel can also be used for athletic or a daily wear
description: The TRU-SPEC Men's 3-in-1 Jacket is designed for staying warm and dry in the inclement weather. These new 2-layer waterproof, windproof, breathable parkas are better than ever. The secret to our new jackets are the high quality, environmentally safe bemis seam tapes. Seam tape is the critical link in the chain of waterproof protection. This packable, zipper jacket is comfortable enough to wear at work, for playing sports, or for simply going about your day. It contains several pockets for stowing your cell phone, wallet, and other valuables.
